data.text: @CTRailCommuters @CTDOTOfficial Ya I get it …..: and my next door neighbor wonders why he has to. fund a public education school system that he never sent kids to …..
@Waterburyline @CTDOTOfficial I’m just sayin’ the day of reckoning is coming when non-rail riders ask why they’re so heavily subsidizing a train they never ride.  Unsustainable.

@CTRailCommuters @CTDOTOfficial The cost to mail a letter, educate our children, police our streets, collect our garbage, plow our roads, treat our wastewater is too high, let’s stop it all and shut it down. Forest through the trees.
@Waterburyline @CTDOTOfficial Yet... given the small ridership the per-trip subsidy was still $24 a ride pre-COVID.  How is that sustainable?
